title: How to get the call stack of WinAPI functions?
content:
Yesterday, I noticed an answer to a question about the purpose of a certain undocumented function, which is a call stack (including the DLL library) for this function, This got me interested in the approachs in this matter!

How to get the WinAPI function's call stack and which DLL libraries that have the function there ? and is there a way to find out all of that statically without the debugger ?
